newsitem.title: INDIA: India's Indo-Gulf down after results.
newsitem.headline: India's Indo-Gulf down after results.

text.p: Shares of Indo-Gulf Fertilisers fell 1.75 rupees, or 5.8 percent, to 28.0 at the Bombay exchange on Tuesday after the firm announced a fall in its 1996/97 (April-March) net, traders said.
Indo-Gulf's net profit fell 25.4 percent to 1.08 billion rupees during the year ended March 31, 1997 from 1.45 billion in the year-ago period.
The company said it maintained a dividend of 1.8 rupees per share.
At the National Stock Exchange, the stock lost 0.65 rupees to 29.05 with 88,700 shares traded by early afternoon.
